IRS990.MissionDescription: TO PROMOTE RESEARCH AND EDUCATION IN THE BIOLOGY OF MARINE ORGANISMS; TO FOSTER UNDERSTANDING AND PRESERVATION OF THE ENVIRONMENT; AND TO ADVANCE HUMAN HEALTH.
IRS990.Description: OUR SCIENTISTS STUDY MARINE AND OTHER NON-MAMMALIAN ORGANISMS TO LEARN ABOUT THE FUNDAMENTAL PROCESSES TAKING PLACE IN CELLS, ORGANS, AND TISSUES. DISCOVERIES MADE AT MDIBL UNDERLIE NEW TREATMENTS FOR HUMAN DISEASES AND DISABILITIES AND HELP US TO UNDERSTAND HOW LIVING CREATURES INTERACT WITH THE ENVIRONMENT. IN ADDITION, MDIBL PROVIDES UNIQUE, HANDS-ON RESEARCH TRAINING OPPORTUNITIES TO MORE THAN 300 HIGH SCHOOL, UNDERGRADUATE, GRADUATE AND MEDICAL STUDENTS EACH YEAR.

Form990ScheduleCPartIV.Explanation: THE LABORATORY IS A MEMBER OF THE MAINE BIOMEDICAL RESEARCH COALITION, THE NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF MARINE LABORATORIES AND THE ASSOCIATION OF INDEPENDENT RESEARCH INSTITUTE. THESE ORGANIZATIONS EXPENDED 15% OR LESS OF TOTAL MEMBER ASSESSMENTS ON LOBBYING EXPENSES IN SUPPORT OF FUNDING FOR BIOLOGICAL RESEARCH. OF TOTAL DUES PAID $2,540 WAS ALLOCATED TO LOBBYING EXPENSE. ADVOCATED FOR CONGRESSIONALLY DIRECTED FUNDING FOR BASIC RESEARCH PROGRAM FOR REGENERATIVE MEDICINE RESEARCH WITH DEPARTMENT OF DEFENSE. TOTAL DIRECT EXPENSE OF $34,381.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: JAMES L. BOYER AND PHOEBE C. BOYER HAVE FAMILY RELATIONSHIP. RICHARD M. HAYS AND JOHN A. HAYS HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 3
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MANAGEMENT OF MDIBL'S INVESTMENT ACCOUNTS IS PERFORMED BY A CONTRACTED INVESTMENT MANAGEMENT FIRM.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THERE ARE 352 MEMBERS OF THE CORPORATION, 99 ARE FULL MEMBERS WITH VOTING POWER.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: FULL MEMBERS HAVE VOTING RIGHTS AND ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ELECTING THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE FORM 990 IS REVIEWED BY SENIOR MANAGEMENT AND GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE PRIOR TO FILING.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ARE ASKED TO REVIEW THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY AND DISCLOSE ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICTS ANNUALLY. THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD HAS CHARGED THE GOVERNANCE COMMITTEE WITH REVIEWING THE WRITTEN POLICY ON AN ANNUAL BASIS AND ENSURING THAT EACH MEMBER OF THE BOARD READS AND SIGNS THE POLICY ANNUALLY. TIME IS SET ASIDE AT ONE BOARD MEETING PER YEAR TO DISCUSS POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MDIBL USES COMPARABILITY DATA FROM OTHER NON-PROFIT IN THE AREA AND IN SAME FIELD OF SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH.

GeneralExplanation.ReturnReference: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: MDIBL MAKES ITS GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AVAILABLE IN PDF FORMAT ON ITS WEBSITE. THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT IS AVAILABLE BY REQUEST. FORM 990 ALSO AVAILABLE ON GUIDESTAR.COM
